ReportText: CHEST PORTABLE ONE VIEW CLINICAL INFORMATION: Shortness of breath. COMPARISON: XR CHEST PA AND LATERAL dated 05/16/2017; XR CHEST PA AND LATERAL dated 05/14/2017 FINDINGS: Stable cardiomegaly. Mild central pulmonary vascular congestion and mild interstitial prominence. Stable calcified right perihilar pulmonary nodule. No large pleural effusions. No pneumothorax. No acute osseous abnormality. IMPRESSION: Mild interstitial pulmonary edema. No large pleural effusions. Signed by: [[PERSONALNAME]]
